name: Golgi Apparatus 3D Model
description: High-resolution 3D visualization of a Golgi apparatus from a mammalian cell. This dataset includes segmented cisternae and vesicles, allowing for detailed analysis of Golgi morphology.

views.title: Complete Golgi Stack
views.description: Complete visualization of the Golgi stack including cis, medial, and trans compartments

views.title: Trans Golgi Network
views.description: Detailed view of the trans Golgi network and associated vesicles

name: Nuclear Pore Complex
description: Detailed structure of the nuclear pore complex showing all major protein components and their arrangement.

views.title: Complete NPC
views.description: Full 3D model of the nuclear pore complex

views.title: Central Channel
views.description: Close-up view of the central transport channel

views.title: Cytoplasmic Filaments
views.description: Detailed view of the cytoplasmic filaments
